schedule.header_subtitle: Check out this week's class schedule.
schedule.select_trainer: Select a trainer to see their schedule.

hero.title: UNLEASH YOUR POTENTIAL
hero.subtitle: State-of-the-art facilities, expert trainers, and a community that motivates.

home_featured.title: Featured Programs
home_featured.pt_desc: One-on-one guidance to achieve your specific fitness goals.
home_featured.group_desc: Join our energetic group classes like Yoga, Zumba, and HIIT.
home_featured.weight_desc: Build strength and muscle with our top-tier equipment and space.

home_cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
home_cta.subtitle: Join a community that is passionate, determined, and supportive. Your fitness goals are within reach.

about_page.header_subtitle: Your journey to a healthier life starts here.
about_page.story_p1: Founded in 2010, GymFlex was born from a simple idea: to create a fitness space that is more than just a gym. We wanted to build a community where people of all fitness levels feel welcome, supported, and motivated.
about_page.story_p2: Over the years, we've grown from a small local studio to a state-of-the-art facility, but our core mission remains the same. We are dedicated to providing the best equipment, the most knowledgeable trainers, and a clean, inspiring environment.
about_page.directions: 2 minutes walk from Myeongil Station Exit 1

programs_page.header_subtitle: Find the perfect fit for your fitness journey.

program_list.title: Personal Training
program_list.description: Tailored one-on-one sessions designed to help you achieve your personal fitness goals faster and more efficiently.

program_list.title: Group HIIT
program_list.description: High-intensity interval training in a motivating group setting. Burn calories, improve endurance, and have fun.

program_list.title: Yoga & Flexibility
program_list.description: Improve your balance, flexibility, and mindfulness with our yoga classes, suitable for all levels from beginner to advanced.

program_list.title: Weight Lifting
program_list.description: Access our wide range of free weights and machines to build strength, increase muscle mass, and sculpt your body.

program_list.title: CrossFit
program_list.description: A challenging mix of functional movements performed at high intensity. Join our strong and supportive CrossFit community.

program_list.title: Cycling Studio
program_list.description: Immersive indoor cycling classes with energetic instructors and heart-pumping music. A great cardio workout.

trainers_page.header_subtitle: World-class trainers dedicated to your success.

trainer_list.name: Jane Doe
trainer_list.bio: Jane is a certified strength and conditioning specialist with over 10 years of experience helping clients build power and resilience.

trainer_list.name: John Smith
trainer_list.bio: A master of Vinyasa and Hatha yoga, John guides students toward physical and mental balance through mindful movement.

trainer_list.name: Emily White
trainer_list.bio: Emily brings infectious energy to every class, designing high-intensity workouts that are as fun as they are effective.

contact_page.header_subtitle: We're here to help and answer any question you might have.
contact_page.info_subtitle: Fill up the form and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.

admin_login.header_subtitle: Log in to manage schedules and content.
